rules_text:
Escalate {2}{U} [i](Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)[/i]
Choose one or both –
• Create a token that’s a copy of target                 creature.
• Untap up for four target lands. Those lands      become the basic land type of your choice in     addition to their other types until end of turn.
notes: fluffy: first ability —> Create a token that’s a copy of target creature. (Cogwork Assembleri)
